title: Sustainable micro-cellulosic additives for high-density fiber cement: Emphasis on rheo-mechanical properties and cost-performance analysis

To combat climate change (i.e., global warming), reducing the CO2 footprint of cement-based building materials can be substantiated by incorporating cellulosic fiber in cement matrix (fiber cement). However, such materials...
